meta() %>%

  meta_name("github-repo" = "djhunter/binsmooth") %>%

  meta_social(
    title = "Smoothing binned data with binsmooth",
    url = "https://djhunter.github.io/binsmooth/index.html",

    image_alt = "R Logo",
    og_author = c("David J. Hunter")
  )
